00123 bool ScriptRayTracer::IsValidPhotonMapType( QString type )
00124 {
00125         if( m_TPhotonMapFactoryList.size() == 0 )        return 0;
00126 
00127         QVector< QString > photonMapNames;
00128         for( int i = 0; i < m_TPhotonMapFactoryList.size(); i++ )
00129                         photonMapNames<< m_TPhotonMapFactoryList[i]->TPhotonMapName();
00130 
00131         int selectedPhotonMap = photonMapNames.indexOf( type );
00132         if( selectedPhotonMap < 0 )     return 0;
00133 
00134         return 1;
00135 }

00138 bool ScriptRayTracer::IsValidRandomGeneratorType( QString type )
00139 {
00140         if( m_RandomDeviateFactoryList.size() == 0 )     return 0;
00141 
00142         QVector< QString > randomGeneratorsNames;
00143         for( int i = 0; i < m_RandomDeviateFactoryList.size(); i++ )
00144                 randomGeneratorsNames<< m_RandomDeviateFactoryList[i]->RandomDeviateName();
00145 
00146         int selectedRandom = randomGeneratorsNames.indexOf( type );
00147 
00148         if( selectedRandom < 0 )        return 0;
00149 
00150         return 1;
00151 }

00153 bool ScriptRayTracer::IsValidSurface( QString surfaceName )
00154 {
00155         if( !m_sceneModel )     return false;
00156 
00157         QModelIndex surfaceIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( surfaceName );
00158         InstanceNode* selectedSurface = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( surfaceIndex );
00159         if( !selectedSurface )  return false;
00160 
00161         return true;
00162 }

00175 int ScriptRayTracer::SetExportSurface( QString filename, QString surfaceName, bool globalCoordinates )
00176 {
00177         if( filename.isEmpty() || surfaceName.isEmpty() )       return 0;
00178 
00179         QModelIndex surfaceIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( surfaceName );
00180         InstanceNode* selectedSurface = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( surfaceIndex );
00181         if( !selectedSurface )  return 0;
00182 
00183         if( globalCoordinates ) return trf::ExportSurfaceGlobalCoordinates( filename, selectedSurface, m_wPhoton, m_photonMap );
00184         else    return trf::ExportSurfaceLocalCoordinates( filename, selectedSurface, m_wPhoton, m_photonMap );
00185 }

00210 int ScriptRayTracer::SetPhotonMapType( QString typeName )
00211 {
00212         QVector< QString > photonMapNames;
00213 
00214         for( int i = 0; i < m_TPhotonMapFactoryList.size(); i++ )
00215                 photonMapNames<< m_TPhotonMapFactoryList[i]->TPhotonMapName();
00216 
00217         m_selectedPhotonMap = photonMapNames.indexOf( typeName );
00218         if( m_selectedPhotonMap < 0 )   return 0;
00219 
00220         return 1;
00221 }

00223 int ScriptRayTracer::SetRandomDeviateType( QString typeName )
00224 {
00225         QVector< QString > randomGeneratorsNames;
00226         for( int i = 0; i < m_RandomDeviateFactoryList.size(); i++ )
00227                 randomGeneratorsNames<< m_RandomDeviateFactoryList[i]->RandomDeviateName();
00228 
00229         int selectedRandom = randomGeneratorsNames.indexOf( typeName );
00230         if(  selectedRandom < 0 )
00231         {
00232                 m_randomDeviate = 0;
00233                 return 0;
00234         }
00235 
00236         m_randomDeviate = m_RandomDeviateFactoryList[selectedRandom]->CreateRandomDeviate();
00237         return 1;
00238 }

00259 int  ScriptRayTracer::SetSunPositionToScene()
00260 {
00261         if (m_sceneModel)
00262         {
00263                 QModelIndex sceneIndex;
00264                 InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneIndex );
00265                 SoSceneKit* coinScene =  static_cast< SoSceneKit* >( sceneInstance->GetNode() );
00266 
00267                 if ((coinScene)&& ( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) ))
00268                 {
00269                         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
00270                         if( m_sunPosistionChanged )     lightKit->ChangePosition( m_sunAzimuth, tgc::Pi/2 - m_sunElevation/*, m_sunDistance*/ );
00271                         return 1;
00272                 }
00273                 std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::SetSunPositionToScene() light not found in scene"<<std::endl;
00274                 return 0;
00275         }
00276         std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::SetSunPositionToScene() sceneModel not found"<<std::endl;
00277         return 0;
00278 }

00280 int  ScriptRayTracer::SetDisconnectAllTrackers(bool disconnect)
00281 {
00282         if (m_sceneModel)
00283         {
00284                 if (disconnect) m_sceneModel->DisconnectAllTrackers();
00285                 else m_sceneModel->ReconnectAllTrackers();
00286                 return 1;
00287         }
00288         std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::SetSunPositionToScene() sceneModel not found"<<std::endl;
00289         return 0;
00290 }

00292 int   ScriptRayTracer::Save( const QString& fileName)
00293 {
00294         if( !m_document->WriteFile( fileName ) )
00295         {
00296                 std::cerr<< "Saving canceled";
00297                 return 0;
00298         }
00299 
00300         std::cerr<< "File saved";
00301         return 1;
00302 }

00305 int ScriptRayTracer::SetTonatiuhModelFile ( QString filename )
00306 {
00307         delete m_document;
00308         m_document = 0;
00309 
00310         m_document = new Document;
00311         if( !m_document->ReadFile( filename ) ) return 0;
00312 
00313         delete m_sceneModel;
00314         m_sceneModel = 0;
00315         m_sceneModel = new SceneModel;
00316 
00317         m_sceneModel->SetCoinScene( *m_document->GetSceneKit() );
00318 
00319         return 1;
00320 }
00321 
00322 int ScriptRayTracer::Trace()
00323 {
00324         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00325         delete m_photonMap;
00326         m_photonMap = 0;
00327 
00328         if( m_selectedPhotonMap > -1 )  m_photonMap = m_TPhotonMapFactoryList[m_selectedPhotonMap]->CreateTPhotonMap();
00329         if( !m_photonMap )
00330         {
00331                 std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::Trace() no photonMap defined"<<std::endl;
00332                 return 0;
00333         }
00334         if( !m_randomDeviate )
00335         {
00336                 std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::Trace() no random generator defined"<<std::endl;
00337                 return 0;
00338         }
00339 
00340         if( !m_sceneModel )
00341         {
00342                 std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::Trace() no model defined"<<std::endl;
00343                 return 0;
00344         }
00345 
00346         QModelIndex sceneIndex;
00347         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneIndex );
00348         if ( !sceneInstance )
00349         {
00350                 std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::Trace() no scene defined"<<std::endl;
00351                 return 0;
00352         }
00353 
00354         InstanceNode* rootSeparatorInstance = sceneInstance->children[1];
00355         if( !rootSeparatorInstance )
00356         {
00357                 std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::Trace() no scene root defined"<<std::endl;
00358                 return 0;
00359         }
00360 
00361         InstanceNode* lightInstance = sceneInstance->children[0];
00362         if ( !lightInstance )
00363         {
00364                 std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::Trace() no light defined"<<std::endl;
00365                 return 0;
00366         }
00367 
00368 
00369         SoSceneKit* coinScene =  static_cast< SoSceneKit* >( sceneInstance->GetNode() );
00370 
00371         if ( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )     return 0;
00372         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
00373         if( m_sunPosistionChanged )     lightKit->ChangePosition( m_sunAzimuth, tgc::Pi/2 - m_sunElevation );
00374         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00375 
00376         if( !lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) ) return 0;
00377         TSunShape* sunShape = static_cast< TSunShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) );
00378 
00379 
00380         if( !lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) ) return 0;
00381         TLightShape* raycastingSurface = static_cast< TLightShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) );
00382 
00383         if( !lightKit->getPart( "transform" ,false ) ) return 0;
00384         SoTransform* lightTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( lightKit->getPart( "transform" ,false ) );
00385         Transform lightToWorld = tgf::TransformFromSoTransform( lightTransform );
00386         lightInstance->SetIntersectionTransform( lightToWorld. GetInverse() );
00387 
00388 
00389         m_sceneModel->PrepareAnalyze();
00390         QVector< QPair< TShapeKit*, Transform > > surfacesList;
00391 
00392         //Compute bounding boxes and world to object transforms
00393         trf::ComputeSceneTreeMap( rootSeparatorInstance, Transform( new Matrix4x4 ), &surfacesList, true );
00394 
00395         TLightKit* light = static_cast< TLightKit* > ( lightInstance->GetNode() );
00396 
00397         light->ComputeLightSourceArea( m_widthDivisions,m_heightDivisions,surfacesList );
00398 
00399         //Check if there is a transmissivity defined
00400         TTransmissivity* transmissivity;
00401         if ( !coinScene->getPart( "transmissivity", false ) )   transmissivity = 0;
00402         else
00403                 transmissivity = static_cast< TTransmissivity* > ( coinScene->getPart( "transmissivity", false ) );
00404 
00405         //Compute the valid areas for the raytracing
00406 
00407         QVector< double > raysPerThread;
00408         const int maximumValueProgressScale = 100;
00409         unsigned long  t1 = m_numberOfRays / maximumValueProgressScale;
00410         for( int progressCount = 0; progressCount < maximumValueProgressScale; ++ progressCount )
00411                 raysPerThread<< t1;
00412 
00413         if( ( t1 * maximumValueProgressScale ) < m_numberOfRays )       raysPerThread<< ( m_numberOfRays-( t1* maximumValueProgressScale) );
00414 
00415         // Create a QFutureWatcher and connect signals and slots.
00416         QFutureWatcher< TPhotonMap* > futureWatcher;
00417 
00418         QMutex mutex;
00419         QFuture< TPhotonMap* > photonMap;
00420         if( transmissivity )
00421                 photonMap = QtConcurrent::mappedReduced( raysPerThread, RayTracer(  rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, raycastingSurface, sunShape, lightToWorld, transmissivity, *m_randomDeviate, &mutex, m_photonMap ), trf::CreatePhotonMap, QtConcurrent::UnorderedReduce );
00422 
00423         else
00424                 photonMap = QtConcurrent::mappedReduced( raysPerThread, RayTracerNoTr(  rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, raycastingSurface, sunShape, lightToWorld, *m_randomDeviate, &mutex, m_photonMap ), trf::CreatePhotonMap, QtConcurrent::UnorderedReduce );
00425 
00426         futureWatcher.setFuture( photonMap );
00427         futureWatcher.waitForFinished();
00428 
00429         /*SoSFVec3f scaleVect = lightTransform->scaleFactor;
00430         float scalex,scaley,scalez;
00431         scaleVect.getValue().getValue(scalex,scaley,scalez);
00432         //m_sceneModel->FinalyzeAnalyze(double(m_numberOfRays)/(raycastingSurface->GetArea()*scalex*scalez));
00433         m_sceneModel->FinalyzeAnalyze( double(m_numberOfRays) /( raycastingSurface->GetValidArea() ) );
00434         */
00435 
00436 
00437         if( !m_photonMap ) return 1;
00438         if( m_photonMap->StoredPhotons() == 0 ) return 1;
00439 
00440         double irradiance  = m_irradiance;
00441         if( irradiance < 0 ) irradiance = sunShape->GetIrradiance();
00442         m_area = raycastingSurface->GetValidArea();
00443         m_wPhoton = ( m_area * irradiance ) / m_numberOfRays;
00444 
00445         return 1;
00446 }
00447 
00448 double ScriptRayTracer::GetArea(){
00449         return m_area;
00450 }
00451 
00452 double ScriptRayTracer::GetNumrays(){
00453         return m_numberOfRays;
00454 }
